verses.verse: Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> my rock, <S%H6697><s%> who teaches <S%H3925><s%> my hands <S%H3027><s%> to war, <S%H7128><s%> and my fingers <S%H676><s%> to battle: <S%H4421><s%>

my loving kindness, <S%H2617><s%> my fortress, <S%H4686><s%> my high tower, <S%H4869><s%> my deliverer, <S%H6403><s%> my shield, <S%H4043><s%> and he in whom I take refuge; <S%H2620><s%> who subdues <S%H7286><s%> my people under me. <S%H5971><s%>
Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> what is man, <S%H120><s%> that you care <S%H3045><s%> for him? <S%H1121><s%> Or the son of man, <S%H582><s%> that you think of him? <S%H2803><s%>
Man <S%H120><s%> is like <S%H1819><s%> a breath. <S%H1892><s%> His days <S%H3117><s%> are like a shadow <S%H6738><s%> that passes away. <S%H5674><s%>
Part <S%H5186><s%> your heavens, <S%H8064><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and come down. <S%H3381><s%> Touch <S%H5060><s%> the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and they will smoke. <S%H6225><s%>
Throw out <S%H1299><s%> lightning, <S%H1300><s%> and scatter <S%H6327><s%> them. <S%H7971><s%> Send out your arrows, <S%H2671><s%> and rout them. <S%H2000><s%>

Stretch <S%H7971><s%> out your hand <S%H3027><s%> from above, <S%H4791><s%> rescue <S%H5337><s%> me, <S%H5337><s%> and deliver me out of great <S%H7227><s%> waters, <S%H4325><s%> out of the hands <S%H3027><s%> of <S%H5236><s%> foreigners; <S%H1121><s%>
whose mouths <S%H6310><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> deceit, <S%H7723><s%> Whose right hand <S%H3225><s%> is a right hand <S%H3225><s%> of falsehood. <S%H8267><s%>
I will sing <S%H7891><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song <S%H7892><s%> to you, <S%H430><s%> God. On a ten-stringed <S%H6218><s%> lyre, <S%H5035><s%> I will sing praises to you. <S%H2167><s%>

You are he who gives <S%H5414><s%> salvation <S%H8668><s%> to kings, <S%H4428><s%> who rescues <S%H6475><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> his servant, <S%H5650><s%> from the deadly <S%H7451><s%> sword. <S%H2719><s%>

Rescue <S%H6475><s%> me, <S%H5337><s%> and deliver me out of the hands <S%H3027><s%> of <S%H5236><s%> foreigners, <S%H1121><s%> whose mouths <S%H6310><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> deceit, <S%H7723><s%> whose right hand <S%H3225><s%> is a right hand <S%H3225><s%> of falsehood. <S%H8267><s%>

Then our sons <S%H1121><s%> will be like well-nurtured <S%H1431><s%> plants, <S%H5195><s%> <S%H5271><s%> our daughters <S%H1323><s%> like pillars <S%H2106><s%> carved <S%H2404><s%> to adorn <S%H8403><s%> a palace. <S%H1964><s%>

Our barns <S%H4200><s%> are full, <S%H4392><s%> filled with all kinds <S%H6329><s%> of provision. <S%H2177><s%> Our sheep <S%H6629><s%> bring forth thousands <S%H503><s%> and ten thousands <S%H503><s%> in our fields. <S%H2351><s%>
Our oxen <S%H441><s%> will pull heavy loads. <S%H5445><s%> There is no breaking in, <S%H6556><s%> and no going away, <S%H3318><s%> and no outcry <S%H6682><s%> in our streets. <S%H7339><s%>
Happy <S%H835><s%> are the people <S%H5971><s%> who are in such a situation. <S%H3602><s%> Happy <S%H835><s%> are the people <S%H5971><s%> whose God <S%H430><s%> is Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
